description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method `Spryker\Zed\MerchantFile\Business\MerchantFileFacade::readMerchantFileStream()()` is using an invalid return type `resource` which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."
Bridges: Method `getCurrentMerchantUser()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
